chunk: Directions: AM/PM After the PLANTED IN BEAUTY double cleanse and Balance + Calm Toning Lotion, dispense a small amount onto ring finger; gently pat cream under eyes and along the orbital bone from the center, outward. Avoid getting into the eyes. Follow with Firm + Smooth + Brighten Reparative Complex and Nourish + Protect Antioxidant Moisturizer
